CustomField.description: Converts Interest Rate value to words
CustomField.formula:
CASE(floor(10 * Interest_Rate__c), 0, CASE(FLOOR(100*Interest_Rate__c )-(10*FLOOR(10*Interest_Rate__c )), 0, "Zero", 1,"One",2, "Two",3,"Three", 4,"Four",5,"Five",6,"Six",7,"Seven",8,"Eight",9,"Nine",null),
1, (CASE(FLOOR(100 * Interest_Rate__c) - (10 * FLOOR(10 * Interest_Rate__c )), 0,"Ten",1,"Eleven",2, "Twelve",3,"Thirteen", 4,"Fourteen",5,"Fifteen",6,"Sixteen",7,"Seventeen",8,"Eighteen",9,"Nineteen",null)),
(CASE(FLOOR(10*Interest_Rate__c), 2,"Twenty-",3, "Thirty-",4,"Forty-",5,"Fifty-",6,"Sixty-",7,"Seventy-",8,"Eighty-",9,"Ninety-",null) + CASE(FLOOR(100*Interest_Rate__c )-(10*FLOOR(10*Interest_Rate__c )), 0, "Zero", 1,"One",2, "Two",3,"Three", 4,"Four",5,"Five",6,"Six",7,"Seven",8,"Eight",9,"Nine",null)) )
+ " Point " +
CASE(FLOOR(1000*Interest_Rate__c)-(10*FLOOR(100*Interest_Rate__c)), 0, "Zero", 1,"One",2, "Two",3,"Three", 4,"Four",5,"Five",6,"Six",7,"Seven",8,"Eight",9,"Nine",null)
+ " " +
CASE(FLOOR(10000*Interest_Rate__c)-(10*FLOOR(1000*Interest_Rate__c)), 0, "Zero", 1,"One",2, "Two",3,"Three", 4,"Four",5,"Five",6,"Six",7,"Seven",8,"Eight",9,"Nine",null)
CustomField.label: IntRate_Words
